content.p: The Malaysian border officially reopened for international travellers on April 1st, 2022. Check out entry requirements including vaccination status, COVID-19 test and quarantine on My Safe Travel website. Please note that these requirements may change at short notice. Visa Requirement Nationals of certain countries are required to have a valid visa before travelling to Malaysia. Please refer to the nearest Malaysian Diplomatic Missions Abroad or Malaysian Government Portal. Weather Malaysia has a tropical climate with temperatures ranging from 23°C to 30°C and regular rainfalls. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001 email: enquiries@nottingham.edu.my
